description:
The South Lake Pant is a great everyday choice for the guy who knows life happens. Built a little tougher than your average pant, this modern fitting workwear style is ready for whatever your day brings.

Because they know that sometimes means the unexpected, they engineered this pant with some extra stretch so you can move freely. But if you're just cruising around town and want a style you can rely on, it's great for that too, thanks to a cool tapered fit that looks good anywhere.
name: Prana South Lake Pants, 34" Inseam - Mens
